content.text: What is your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I love to stay in and watch movies or read. What about you?
I like to bake and cuddle with my cat Mater.
That sounds really relaxing. I wish I had a cat.
You should get one! They're the best companions.
I know, I've been thinking about it. I just have to find the right time.
Well, when you do, make sure you post pictures of them on here.
I will! I'm sure they'll be pretty cute.
I bet they will! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a poodle named Nanette. She's a sweetheart.
Poodles are so cute! I've always wanted one.
They're the best! They're so smart and loving.
I bet they are. I'm so jealous.
